How to obtain 3 more oak logs in Minecra: Answer: You can obtain 3 more oak logs in Minecraft by finding and chopping down an oak tree. Oak trees can be found in most biomes in the game. Use an axe to chop down the tree and it will drop oak logs.
How to craft a crafting table in Minecra: Answer: To craft a crafting table in Minecraft, you need four wooden planks. Arrange the planks in a square shape in the crafting grid to create a crafting table. Once crafted, you can use the crafting table to create more complex items and tools.
